alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 22 at 4:06AM MDT until June 23 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Colorado, including the following counties, Morgan and Washington. * WHEN...Until 715 AM MDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Highway 63 remains closed between Akron and Anton due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 406 AM MDT, Law Enforcement reported that flooding is already occurring. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Akron, Otis, Elba, Anton, Lindon, Woodlin School, Platner, Woodrow, Gary, Last Chance and Hyde.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
